locationDescriptionGae: Iarrann sí, 'Cad a thugann isteach inár gcónaíodh dorcha thú, gan choinne?
locationDescriptionEng: You sense the presence of the veiled ones.
One of them approaches.
She asks, 'What brings you to our dark haven, uninvited?
Speak your purpose.
gaeTurnToPage: Tagann meangadh gáire uirthí. 'Frog anois thú,' arsa sí. Laighsfaidh braon ó Pol an Púca thú. go dté tú slán.
Sna garráin naofa, ciúnann gáire na síoga.Feicim Bád le seoltaí iarainn.
engTurnToPage: The witch smiles. 'You are now a frog. A drop from Pollapooka will cure you. Good day.'
I hear conflict in the Otherworld.  I see Ships with Iron sails.

locationDescriptionEng: You sense the presence of the veilled ones.
One of them, in a velvet cloak, steps forward.
She asks, 'What brings you to our dark haven, mortal?
Speak your purpose if you dare.'
